mapper.insert: insert into tb_room_order(order_id, account_name, room_type, room_amount, order_price, start_time, end_time, order_status, hand_in_time) values (#{orderId}, #{account.accountName}, #{roomType.typeId}, #{roomAmount}, #{orderPrice}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{handInTime})
mapper.select: select order_id, account_name, room_type, room_amount, order_price, start_time, end_time, order_status, hand_in_time from tb_room_order where account_name = #{accountName}
select count(1) from tb_room_order where date(hand_in_time) = date(#{handInTime})
